about_the_game:
In this choice based adult visual novel, you'll take the role of Kevin Keine, a brilliant gynecologist destined for a future of wealth, success, and gorgeous women! In fact, he finds himself about to leave his job in a small town doctor's office to be hired by the very wealthy clinic that treats Hollywood's top stars!!! This is because of his great talent: Kevin is in fact considered an excellent gynecologist, but the thing in which he really excels is the special way in which he "touches" women! He is able to bring all women who come to him to the most powerful orgasm just by the movement of his fingers! This has earned him the nickname " Hands of Gold"!
Unfortunately, on his way to success, some unexpected events force him to divert his path, facing a series of complicated adventures, meeting new characters and having to make difficult decisions.
Through the choices you make you can decide Hands of Gold's fate, dealing with all the strange events this adventure places before him, distributing your great gift to the women you deem deserving, building up the game's story until you unlock one of the various endings available!

The game is actually COMPLETED.

It includes approximately:

- 1400 images
- 32000 words
- several choices who changes the story
- 3 different endings

content_descriptors.notes:
The game includes several characters, who will be involved in many situations intended for adults, sexual activities of various kind and some action scenes.

Main adult themes included:
- Nudity.
- Masturbation.
- Explicit sex.
- Oral sex.
- Anal sex.
- Casual sex.
- Sexual assault.
- Gyno exams
- Strong language.
- References and use of alcohol, tobacco and drugs.

This game is intended for adult people, and includes sensitive content who someone could find offensive. Take note of that before playing.

name: Hands Of Gold

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A choice based adult visual novel about Kevin Keine, a brilliant gynecologist called "Hands of Gold" and it's road to... Success! :)
